resources.string:
Nmap Wrapper for Android
Created by Werebug (https://werebug.com)

This is an Android wrapper around the official Nmap binary cross-compiled for Android.

Note: This application does not support rooted phones at the moment, therefore all Nmap features that need root rights will not work.

Source code, cross-compilation instructions and configuration are available at https://github.com/ruvolof/anmap-wrapper. Feel free to contribute or report bugs on Github.
